subject: Re: did I get greedy quantifiers wrong ?
body:
On 5/31/07, Sharan Basappa  wrote:
snip
> $str =~ m/m(.*i?)(.*pi)/;
snip

? only means non-greedy when following a * or a +.  When it follows a
pattern it means optional.
